The player - the titular incubus - must roam the city each night attempting to spread his seed.</p> <p>Events unfold differently depending on what choices the player makes. (story, css, graphics, etc) and want to use them in a project of your own, feel free to do so. All I ask is that you credit me, cite //Incubus City//, and provide a link to one of my sites or my email. This covers almost everything in this game with the exception of the animated gifs, almost none of which did I edit in any meaningful way so you don't need to credit me.</p> </div> <<topbutton >> <div id="tab-M" class="tab-content"> <h2>Modding</h2> <p>It is possible to mod Incubus City to have new images. Currently there is one mod available (sp1ker's video mod) and two are in the works (an all-Chinese girl mod and a more ambiguous mod). </p> <p>Mods are selected via the Mods button in the sidebar. //Note that the mods cannot be changed while you are on this About page. Yeah, I know it's weird. Sorry about that.//</p> <p>Somewhat counterintuitively, all currently available mods will already be in the game; this is due to how Twine works and the current limits of my proficiency in it. The actual image files needed for these mods must be downloaded separately.</p> <p>If you are interested in making your own mod, I encourage you to do so. I've tried to make it easy and am open to input on improving the process. Follow the link below to learn more. </p> <p>[[Go to modding page.|seeModding]]</p> </div><!-- container --> <<topbutton >> <<backbutton >> <BRUTAL>You feel the rise of excitement in you, and you let out a primal roar.</BRUTAL> <<image "images/misc/power.jpg" >> Their faces turn white with terror. It's all wrong - you are lying on your back, not facing down, and you feel a weight lift off of you. You feel incredibly frail and dizzy. You close your eyes and try to wake yourself. Nothing happens. With all your focus, you can dimly sense the hospital room in the real world, a stumbling form moving away from your unconscious body. And then it dawns on you: you are trapped inside this woman's mind. The body you feel outside of the illusion is hers, and her spirit has just awoken inside //your// body. No! You scream, but your voice echoes in an empty world. The sands darken and the ocean becomes black, and her body disintegrates into ash. Your evil has tainted this world, and your aggressive entry has forced her consciousness out, across the bridge between minds and into your own. Now, the bridge is gone. This was not a mind you should have tampered with. <hr> Time becomes meaningless. Stuck on this beach, you wander aimlessly. There is shore extending infinitely in both directions. Escape by sea is impossible, and moving inland just takes you to a hazily-defined desert. Visions occasionally flash across the sky, perhaps echoes of old memories of hers, or perhaps a glimpse of the world being experienced by your possessed body. If there is a thin thread connecting your minds even now, you are unable to find a means of using it. _i<_unfound_tokens.length; _i++ >> <<set _this_token = _unfound_tokens[_i] >> <<set _this_hint = $db_tokens[_this_token].hint >> <<if _this_hint >> <<set _relevant_hints.push(_this_hint) >> <</if >> <</for >> /* <<set _mutterings = { Z1: "Try as you might... five hearts cannot be won in a night.", Z2: "The pursuit of tokens... it is a thankless task...", Z3: "Ssss..." } >> */ <</silently >><<= _relevant_hints.random() >><<widget "showArray" >> <<set _array = $args[0] >> <<set _BADS = $args[1]?$args[1]:[] >> <<set _RADS = $args[2]?$args[2]:[] >> <div style="display:block; height: 1px; '></div> <</widget >> <<widget "mindread" >> <<set _required = $args[1]?$args[1]:2 >> <<set _thought = $args[0]?$args[0]:"..." >> <<if typeof _required=="string" >> <<set _thought = _required >> <<set _required = 2 >> <</if >> <<if $hypnoXP.level()>=_required >> <span><<pass hypno >>"<power>_thought</power>" <<= "you hear a voice say, with your mind|says a thought|says the mind of someone nearby".sayOne() >>.</span><</if >><</widget >> <<widget "instinct" >> <<set _required = $args[1]?$args[1]:4 >> <<set _thought = $args[0]?$args[0]:"..." >> <<if $incubusXP.level()>=_required >> <span><<pass incubus >><power>_thought</power></span> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "sexinstinct" >> <<set _required = $args[1]?$args[1]:8 >> <<set _thought = $args[0]?$args[0]:"..." >> <<if $sexXP.level()>=_required >> <span><<pass sex >>_thought</span> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "killerinstinct" >> <<set _required = $args[1]?$args[1]:8 >> <<set _thought = $args[0]?$args[0]:"..." >> <<if $brutalXP.level()>=_required >> <span><<pass brutal >><power>_thought</power></span> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "spacer" >> <div style="height: 10px;"></div> <</widget >> <<widget "showobject" >> <<if $args[0] === undefined || $args[0] === null >> <p>Database not found... $args[0]</p> <</if >> <<silently >> <<set _data = $args[0] >> data: _data <br> <<set _rows = Object.keys(_data) >> rows: _rows <br> <<set _basic_item = _data[_rows[0]] >>basic_item: _basic_item.name <br> <<set _cols = Object.keys(_basic_item) >> cols: _cols<br> <</silently >> <table class='sortable'> <tr> <th>key </th> <<for _c=0; _c<_cols.length; _c++ >> <th>_cols[_c]</th> <</for >> </tr> <<for _r=0; _r<_rows.length; _r++ >> <<set _obj = _data[_rows[_r]] >> <tr> <td> ''_rows[_r]'' </td> <<for _c=0; _c<_cols.length; _c++ >> <<set _tddata = _obj[_cols[_c]] >> <td> <<if typeof _tddata=='number' >> <<= _tddata.visual() >> <<elseif typeof _tddata=='string' >> <<if _tddata.length > 30 >> <small>_tddata</small> <<else >> <<= _tddata.split(' ').join('<br>') >> <</if >> <<else >> <<= _tddata >> <</if >> </td> <</for >> </tr> <</for >> </table> <</widget >> <<widget "showowneditem" >> <<set _IT = $args[0] >> <<set _extra_description = $args[1] ? $args[1] : "" >> <<set _not_item_name = $args[2] ? $args[2] : false >> <<if State.variables["have_"+_IT] or _not_item_name >> <<showitem _IT _extra_description _not_item_name >> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "showitem" >> <<set _IT = $args[0] >> <<set _extra_description = $args[1] ? $args[1] : "" >> <<set _not_item_name = $args[2] ? $args[2] : false >> <<set _imgurl = "images/items/"+_IT+".png" >> <li class='popholder'><<image _imgurl >> <div class='pop small'> <<image _imgurl >><br> <<if !_not_item_name and $db_items[_IT] >> ''<<= $db_items[_IT].name >>''<br> <small> <<= $db_items[_IT].description >> _extra_description </small> <<else >> ''_not_item_name''<br> <small> _extra_description </small> <</if >> </div> </li> <</widget >> <<widget "loadup" >> <<silently >> <<set _db_name = $args[0] >> <<set _db_array = Story.get(_db_name).text.split("\n") >> <<set _db_object = {} >> <<set _db_properties = _db_array[0].split("\t") >> <<for _e = 1; _e < _db_array.length; _e++ >> <<set _myRow = _db_array[_e].split("\t") >> <<set _myKey = _myRow[0] ? _myRow[0] : _myRow[1] >> <<if !_myKey >><<continue >><</if >> <h2>_myKey</h2> <<set _db_object[_myKey] = {} >> <<for _f = 0; _f < _db_properties.length; _f++ >> <<set _id = _db_properties[_f] >> <<set _data = _myRow[_f] >> /* numbers, booleans and suchlike */ <<if _data=="" >> <<elseif !isNaN(_data) >><<set _data = parseInt(_data) >> <<elseif _data=="true" >><<set _data = true >> <<elseif _data=="false" >><<set _data = false >> <<elseif _data=="null" >><<set _data = null >> <<else >> <</if >> <<set _db_object[_myKey][_id] = _data >> ''_id'' _data <br> <</for >> <</for >> <<set State.variables[_db_name] = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(_db_object)) >> <</silently >> <</widget >> <<widget "loadup_json" >> <<silently >> <</silently >> <<set _db_name = $args[0] >> <<set _db_object = JSON.parse(Story.get(_db_name).text) >> <<set State.variables[_db_name] = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(_db_object)) >> <</widget >> <<widget "showobject" >> <<if $args[0] === undefined || $args[0] === null >> <p>Database not found... $args[0]</p> <</if >> <<silently >> <<set _data = $args[0] >> data: _data <br> <<set _rows = Object.keys(_data) >> rows: _rows <br> <<set _basic_item = _data[_rows[0]] >>basic_item: _basic_item.name <br> <<set _cols = Object.keys(_basic_item) >> cols: _cols<br> <</silently >> <table class='sortable'> <tr> <th>key </th> <<for _c=0; _c<_cols.length; _c++ >> <th>_cols[_c]</th> <</for >> </tr> <<for _r=0; _r<_rows.length; _r++ >> <<set _obj = _data[_rows[_r]] >> <tr> <td> ''_rows[_r]'' </td> <<for _c=0; _c<_cols.length; _c++ >> <<set _tddata = _obj[_cols[_c]] >> <td> <<if typeof _tddata=='number' >> <<= _tddata.visual() >> <<elseif typeof _tddata=='string' >> <<if _tddata.length > 15 >> <small>_tddata</small> <<else >> <<= _tddata.split(' ').join('<br>') >> <</if >> <<else >> <<= _tddata >> <</if >> </td> <</for >> </tr> <</for >> </table> <</widget >> <<widget "showsimpleobject" >> <<silently >> <<set _data = $args[0] >> data: _data <br> <<set _rows = Object.keys(_data) >> rows: _rows <br> <<set _basic_item = _data[_rows[0]] >>basic_item: _basic_item.name <br> <<set _cols = Object.keys(_basic_item) >> cols: _cols<br> <</silently >> <table class='sortable'> <<for _r=0; _r<_rows.length; _r++ >> <<set _obj = _data[_rows[_r]] >> <tr> <td> ''_rows[_r]'' </td> <td> <<= _data[_rows[_r]] >> </td> </tr> <</for >> </table> <</widget >> <<widget unless >><span class='spaceend'><<if typeof $args[0]!=="undefined" and $args[0] >>$args[0]<<elseif typeof $args[1]!=="undefined" and $args[1] >>$args[1]<<elseif typeof $args[2]!=="undefined" and $args[2] >>$args[2]<<elseif typeof $args[3]!=="undefined" and $args[3] >>$args[3]<<elseif typeof $args[4]!=="undefined" and $args[4] >>$args[4]<</if >></span> /* <<for _a = 0; _a < $args.length; _a++ >> <<if typeof $args[_a] !== "undefined" >> <<switch typeof $args[_a] >> <<case "string" >> <<if $args[_a].length > 0 >> $args[_a]<<set _a=999 >> <<else >> <</if >> <<default >> $args[_a]<<set _a=999 >> <</switch >> <<else >> <</if >> <</for >> <<= typeof $args[0] >><<= $args[0].length >> <<if typeof $args[0] !== "undefined" >>$args[0] <<elseif typeof $args[1] !== "undefined" >>$args[1] <<elseif typeof $args[2] !== "undefined" >>$args[2] <<elseif typeof $args[3] !== "undefined" >>$args[3] <<elseif typeof $args[4] !== "undefined" >>$args[4] <<elseif typeof $args[5] !== "undefined" >>$args[5]<</if >> */ <</widget >> <<widget "hr" >> <hr style="width:25%" > <</widget >> <<widget "money" >>$<<=$args[0].visual() >><</widget >> <<widget "number" >><<=$args[0].visual() >><</widget >> <p><PIMP>Oh, and one more thing...</PIMP> he says, as you are about to hang up. <PIMP>I uh... I happen to notice that these girls you're sending me tend to be a little on the pregnant side.</PIMP></p> <<imageanchor wade13 >> <p><POV>Oh geez really? That's weird and unfortunate.</POV> you lie, hoping this doesn't ruin this lucrative business connection.</p> <p><PIMP>Haha, ol' Waid ain't a sap you know. You're out there to sow your seed, I can tell. But don't worry, it's not really much of a problem, there's a customer for every kind of girl, including pregnant ones. But the reason I mention it is that I figure you got an insanely high sperm count to consistently knock up these broads. Well wouldn't you know, it just so happens I have a use for a guy who's got a 100% pregging rate.</PIMP></p> <p><POV>You... you do?</POV> you say, honestly rather surprised.</p> <p><PIMP>Yeah, so listen. I have a business partner Zimmerman, the chairman of the organization that owns the hospital we met at, in fact. I pay him his cut, he lets me run my business out of all of his facilities. Trouble is, he's taking bigger and bigger cuts as time goes by. I need to sneak customers under his nose to make a profit these days, and it's not easy.</PIMP> <<imageanchor wade14 >> <p>He continues: <PIMP>It just so happens that he's a family man, and last time his wife had a kid he was out of my hair for quite a while, spending time with his preggo wife and eventually with his new baby. I figure she gets knocked up again, the cycle repeats and my profit margins go back up for a while.</PIMP></p> <p><POV>So you want me to, what, go to his house and rape his wife?</POV> you ask.</p> <p><PIMP>No dummy, you can't have her crying oh boo hoo hoo a big bad man came in here and raped me; he's gotta think it's his kid or the scam won't work. I need you to go there and seduce her. I know ol' Eustace hasn't been getting any from him on account of he makes frequent use of my girls. Go to his house during a week day, knock on the front door, chat her up, and then paint her uterus white. What do you say?</PIMP></p> <<imageanchor wade15 >> <p>Since the plan suits your needs as well, you agree. He fills you in on the details, and you jot down the address for future reference.</p> <p><PIMP>I'll take care of it.</PIMP> you tell him as you hang up.</p> <<set $quest_pimpette = 1 >><<do "Show me items." choice:items >> <<do "Show me tokens." choice:tokens >> <<do "Show me endings." choice:endings >> <<do "Show me starts." choice:starts >> <<do "Show me wedding talk." choice:wedding >> <<do "Show me say tests." choice:saytest >> <<do "Show me nothing." choice: >> <hr> <h1>$CHOICE</h1> <<switch $CHOICE >> <<case "items" >> <<include "setDBs" >> <<showobject $db_items >> <<case "tokens" >> <<include "setDBs" >> <<showobject $db_tokens >> <<case "starts" >> <<include "setDBs" >> <<showobject $db_starts >> <<case "endings" >> <<include "setDBs" >> <<showobject $db_endings >> <<case "wedding" >> <<include "setDBs" >> <<loadup_json db_weddingtalk>> <<showobject $db_weddingtalk >> <<case "saytest" >> <<do "if CHOICE equals 'saytest'" CHOICE=saytest >> <<do "if CHOICE does not equal 'saytest'" CHOICE!=saytest >> <<do "if CHOICE includes 'test'" CHOICE}test >> <<do "if CHOICE includes 'zzz'" CHOICE}test >> <<do "if money > 3000" money>3000 >> <<do "if money < 3000" money<3000 >> <<default >> <<set _list = Story.lookup("tags", "") >> <<set _list = Story.lookupWith(function (p) { return (p.title); }); >> <ul class='fivecol'> <<for _i=0; _i<_list.length; _i++>> <<set _this = _list[_i] >> <li> <<capture _this>> <<link _this.title >><<goto _this.title >><</link>> <</capture>> </li> <</for>> </ul> <</switch >> <hr> <<topbutton >> <<backbutton >><<widget "card" >> <<if $args[0] >> <div class='card owned'> <<background $args[0] $args[1] $args[2] >> </div> <<else >> <div class='card'> <<if $have_sight >> <div class='label'><<unless $args[2] "" >></div> <</if >> </div> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "background" >> <<if $args[0] >> <<set _alignment = $args[1] ? $args[1] : "none" >> <<set _label = $args[2] ? "<div class='label'>"+$args[2].justName()+"</div>" : "" >> <<set _url = $args[0] >> <<set _wasswapped = false >> <<if !$imgmod >> <<set $imgmod="default" >> <</if >> <<set _swaplist = Object.keys($db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist) >> <<silently >> <<if _swaplist.includes(_url) >> <<set _url = $db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist[_url] >> <<set _wasswapped = true >> <</if >> <</silently >> <<set _html = "<div class='bg_div' " >> <<set _html += "style=\"background-image: url('"+_url+"')\">" >> <<set _html += _label+"</div>" >> _html <<else >> <<noball >> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "image" >> <<if $args[0] >> <<set _alignment = $args[1] ? $args[1] : "none" >> <<set _url = $args[0] >> <<set _classes = $args[1] ? $args[1] : " " >> <<set _wasswapped = false >> <<if !$imgmod >> <<set $imgmod="default" >> <</if >> <<set _swaplist = Object.keys($db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist) >> <<silently >> $db_imagemods.chocolate.name / _swaplist / _url / $imgmod <<if _swaplist.includes(_url) >> <<set _url = $db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist[_url] >> <<set _wasswapped = true >> <</if >> <</silently >> <<finalimage _url $args >> <<if $modder and _hideurl != true >> <div class='debug small'> {{{<<image}}} '_url' {{{ >>}}} </div> <</if >> <<else >> <<noball >> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "finalimage" >> <<set _url = $args[0] >> <<set _args = $args[1] ? $args[1] : [] >> <<set _isVideo = false >> <<set _hideurl = false >> <<set _pointy = '' >> <<set _videostuff = 'loop autoplay' >> <<if _url!="hide" and _url >> <<if _args.includes("left") >><<set _pointy = "<" >><</if >> <<if _args.includes("right") >><<set _pointy = ">" >><</if >> <<if _args.includes("test") >><<set _test=true >><<set _videostuff='' >><</if >> <<if _args.includes("nourl") >><<set _test = true >><<set _hideurl = true >><</if >> <<if _url.includes(".webm") >><<set _isVideo = true >><</if >> <<if _isVideo >> <<set _html = "<video "+_videostuff+" src='"+_url+"'></video>" >> <<else >> <<set _html = "[" + _pointy + "img["+_url+"]]" >> <</if >> <<if _isVideo and _wasswapped >> <span class='modswap video'>_html</span> <<elseif _wasswapped >> <span class='modswap image'>_html</span> <<else >> _html <</if >> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "imageleft" >> <<image $args[0] 'left' >> <</widget >> <<widget "imageright" >> <<image $args[0] 'right' >> <</widget >> <<widget "imagefade" >> <<set _base_img = $args[0] >> <<set _modded_img = $args[0].replace('.', '_mod.') >> <<set _align = $args[1] ? $args[1] : null >> <div class='imagefade'> <<image _base_img _align >> <div class='fader'> <<image _modded_img _align >> </div> </div> <</widget >> <<widget "modimage" >> THIS DOES NOT WORK YET <<set _mod = $args[0] >> <<set _url = $args[1] >> <<if $db_imagemods[_mod].swaplist[_url] >> <<image $db_imagemods[_mod].swaplist[_url] >> <<else >> <<= $db_imagemods[_mod].swaplist["images/brand/logo.png"] >> <<image "images/brand/logo.png" >> <</if >> <</widget >> <<widget "imageanchor" >> <<set _anchor = $args[0] >> <<set _swaplist = Object.keys($db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist) >> <<if _swaplist.includes(_anchor) >> <<set _url = $db_imagemods[$imgmod].swaplist[_anchor] >> <div class='anchorswap'><<finalimage _url >></div> <<else >> <</if >> <<if $modder >> <div class='debug small'>{{{<<imageanchor}}} '_anchor' {{{ >>}}}</div> <</if >> <</widget >> <p>Which image mod would you like to use? Currently //<<= $db_imagemods[$imgmod].name >>// is selected.</p> <div class='word_buttons'> <<set _arr = Object.keys($db_imagemods) >> <<for _i=0; _i<_arr.length; _i++ >> <<set _ki = _arr[_i] >> <<if _ki==$imgmod >><<set _checked to 'checked' >> <<else >><<set _checked to 'unchecked' >> <</if >> <<capture _ki _checked >> <label > <<radiobutton "$imgmod" _ki _checked >> <<= "[>img[mods/"+_ki+"/logo.png]]" >> <big class='titlefont'> ''<<=$db_imagemods[_ki].name >>'' </big> by <<=$db_imagemods[_ki].author >> <small>(version <<=$db_imagemods[_ki].version >>)</small> <br> <p> <<= $db_imagemods[_ki].description >> </p> <p style='font-size:80%'> This mod changes: <ul class='comas sentence'> <li><<= Object.keys($db_imagemods[_ki].swaplist).length >> images</li> <<if $db_imagemods[_ki].stylesheet >><li>the stylesheet</li><</if >> </ul> </p> <<if $db_imagemods[_ki].url >> ''<<= "<a target='_blank' href='" + $db_imagemods[_ki].url + "'>Download Image File</a>" >>''<br> <</if >> </label> <</capture >> <</for >> </div> <<clear >> <h4>Note</h4> <ul> <li>Note: Non-Wape mod image packs are downloaded separately. These mods will not work without their corresponding image pack.</li> <li>Selected mod will activate upon pagechange.</li> <li>Accessing About page or Black Book immediately after choosing mod will revert to the previous mod. (This is a bug.)</li> <li>For info on modding the game, go to the About section.</li> </ul> /* <p>To test a mod to ensure all images are in place, use the [[Mod Tester|modTester]].</p> <<button "Return" >><<goto preyList >><</button >> */ <<if !$imgmod >> <<set $imgmod="default" >> <</if >> <<set $db_imagemods = {} >> <<set $db_imagemods.default = { name: "Vanilla Incubus City", author: "Wape", version: "N/A", description: "''Just the standard Incubus City experience.''", swaplist: { "images/brand/logo.png" : "images/brand/logo.png" } } >> <<set $db_imagemods.chocolate = { name: "Chocolate Incubus City", author: "Wape", version: "1", description: "A test mod. Replaces thief with a new model.", swaplist: { "images/brand/logo.png" : "mods/chocolate/logo.png", "an_image" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.jpg", "images/in/thief/bj.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/bj.gif", "images/in/thief/brutal-rape.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/brutal-rape.gif", "images/in/thief/brutal-sex.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/brutal-sex.gif", "images/in/thief/meet.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/meet.jpg", "images/in/thief/preg.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/preg.jpg", "images/in/thief/rape.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/rape.gif", "images/in/thief/seduce 1.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/seduce 1.gif", "images/in/thief/seduce 2.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/seduce 2.gif", "images/in/thief/wife.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.jpg", "images/in/thief/wife.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.gif", "images/in/thief/wifecard.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wifecard.jpg" } } >> <<include "modSpiker" >> <<include "modHentai" >> <h1>Modding</h1>\ <a href='#section1'>Installing Mod</a> <a href='#section2'>Creating Mod</a> <a href='#section4'>Modding Tools</a> Incubus City contains a modding feature that allows you to swap out the existing images with a whole different set. Due to the limitations of Twine/Sugarcube and of the author of this game, mod data will need to be manually added within the main game by myself or someone sufficiently versed in Twine. For this reason installing/activating mods is a little odd. <h3 id='section1'>Activate A Mod</h3>\ All the mods listed in this game are functional but first require an image pack to be downloaded and installed. Once downloaded (see mod descriptions for url) the mod must be unzipped to a corresponding folder: {{{[Incubus City folder]\mods\[mod foldername]\ }}} So for example Sp1ke's WEBM would go here: {{{[Incubus City folder]\mods\Sp1ke\ }}} Once the files are in the right place, simply select the mod from the list and play the game. <<topbutton >> <h3 id='section2'>How To Make A Mod</h3>\ Below is a example code for a image swap mod. {{{ <<set $db_imagemods.chocolate = { name: "Chocolate City", author: "Wape", link: "http://wapecrime.blogspot.com", description: "A test mod. Replaces thief with a new model. ", swaplist: { "an_image" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.jpg", "images/in/thief/bj.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/bj.gif", "images/in/thief/brutal-rape.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/brutal-rape.gif", "images/in/thief/brutal-sex.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/brutal-sex.gif", "images/in/thief/meet.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/meet.jpg", "images/in/thief/preg.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/preg.jpg", "images/in/thief/rape.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/rape.gif", "images/in/thief/seduce 1.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/seduce 1.gif", "images/in/thief/seduce 2.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/seduce 2.gif", "images/in/thief/wife.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.jpg", "images/in/thief/wife.gif" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.gif", "images/brand/logo.png" : "mods/chocolate/logo.png" } } >> }}} Lets go over it line by line: {{{<<set $db_imagemods.chocolate = {}}} The above adds a mod to the imagemod database called 'chocolate'. Call yours whatever you want. {{{ name: "Chocolate City", }}} The human-readable name of the mod that will be presented to the player in the mod list. {{{ author: "Wape", }}} Your name or moniker, to be listed next to the mod name in the modlist. {{{ link: "http://wapecrime.blogspot.com", }}} A link to your profile, website, blog, whatever. Not implemented yet but will be. {{{ description: "A test mod. Replaces thief with a new model. ", }}} A description of the mod. Can be a fair bit longer and more detailed than this one if you like. {{{ swaplist: { }}} Ok here's where the image swap list starts. From this point onwards are instructions to the game where to insert your images. {{{ "images/in/thief/meet.jpg" : "mods/chocolate/thief/meet.jpg", }}} On the left of the : is the url of an image you want to replace. On the right is the name of the image that will be replacing it. Replacements do not have to be the same file type as the originals - for example a gif can become a webm file. For your convenience, I had the game put urls of images under those images while you play the game in debug mode. I suggest storing replacement images in a folder within the mods folder that bears the id of the mod. {{{ "an_image" : "mods/chocolate/thief/wife.jpg", }}} On the left of the : is the name of an image anchor. An image anchor appears like this when you are in debug mode ({{{<<imageanchor 'an_image' >>}}}), but is invisible when you aren't. The above line tells the game to place the image specified on the right into the spot occupied by the anchor named. The image anchors exist so you can put images where I didn't. {{{ "images/brand/logo.png" : "mods/chocolate/logo.png" }}} You can even swap the logo, as well as item images, in the same manner. Note that there is no comma after this image swap pair. This is the last image swap pair in the list, so there should be no comma after it. If there is, the whole thing won't work and you'll feel really dumb. If you break it and can't get it to work in-game no matter how hard you try, don't worry about it. When you send it to me just let me know that you fucked up and I will use my massive unparalleled intellect to fix it for you. There may be more features to come. Let me know if you have any requests. <<topbutton >> <h3 id='section4'>Modding Tools</h3>\ ''Modder Mode'' is designed to help you with modding. It shows the url of each image under each image, as well as the names and locations of image anchors. To activate Modder Mode, enter "Modder" as your name. To de-active, enter "Not Modder"./*<<link 'Activate Modder Mode' >><<set $modder=true >><<goto modding >><</link >> | <<link 'Deactivate Modder Mode' >><<set $modder=false >><<goto modding >><</link >>*/ ''Mod Tester'' will display all images as defined by the modlist, to allow you to easily see if any are missing or misspelt.
